author: AP
title: Facebook to warn users who "liked" coronavirus hoaxes
description: Facebook says it will also direct people who engaged with those posts to information about virus myths debunked by the World Health Organization.
content: NEW YORK: Have you liked or commented on a Facebook post about the COVID-19 pandemic that turned out to be a hoax? The social media company said Thursday it is now going to let users know if they liked, reacted or commented on posts with harmful misinformatio… [+2101 chars]
